page.description: Several plugins are available which provide functions to make interacting with the iOS keyboard a bit easier and include events to indicate when the keyboard will be shown or hidden.

description.p: The *[cordova-plugin-keyboard]* plugin adds functionality to customize and control the device keyboard, including several events that are triggered when the keyboard is shown or hidden.
The *[cordova-plugin-ionic-keyboard]* provides functionality to customize and control the device keyboard and is designed to work with the cordova-plugin-ionic-webview.
